abstract: Canada’s farm minister argued that letting BHP buy Potash would have offered Australia’s farm sector too much of an advantage.
snippet: Canada’s farm minister argued that letting BHP buy Potash would have offered Australia’s farm sector too much of an advantage.
lead_paragraph: Canada’s farm minister offered one reason that Canada blocked the proposed takeover of the Potash Corporation of Saskatchewan on Thursday, but markets will have to wait a month for all the details to emerge, Reuters reports.

headline.main: Farming Feud: A Reason Why BHP Failed
